message: Conditional JavaScript, CSS, callbacks and classNames for environments.
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message:
wow that's very interesting! Many times I go for "browser-sniffing" but after all I end up avoiding it.
I think we are in a world that no longer need a library like that. Browsers may handle things differently but the differences aren't that big. And the libraries we are using are patched to check against the inconsistencies ... Not sure why would I use that, yet it's a great resource to be in our arsenal :)
